Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.
The Reference ID for an existing or new Ledger Currency Mapping.
The name of the Ledger Currency Mapping.
The description of the Ledger Currency Mapping.

All data for the Ledger Currency Mapping Line within Ledger Currency Mapping. You can specify at least one to many Ledger Currency Mapping Line within the Ledger Currency Mapping. Note: You can only add or update Ledger Currency Mapping.

Ledger_Currency_Mapping_Name.description: The name of the Ledger Currency Mapping.
